title: Is FaceID slower than TouchID? - Quora

response.answer_text: FaceID is a very new thing right now.. So, yes, it is a little bit slower than the touch ID that the iPhone 8 and 7 series has. The speed and accuracy is fully software dependent, and can be optimized with software updates. The face unlock thing, that Oneplus is using in it’s Oneplus 5T - is faster than the face id !!

No. Timing FaceID versus TouchID with a stopwatch is not a proper comparison. FaceID is a passive unlock while TouchID is a deliberate unlock. That has to be taken into account. Once you factor in ease of use and “consciousness of action” FaceID is far superior.
